revised_title: Arthur Wormall's Contributions to Biochemistry and Immunology
tldr: The article is a biographical memoir of Arthur Wormall, a prominent biochemist and immunologist. Wormall made significant contributions to the fields of biochemistry and immunology, including research on the composition of sap, the tyrosinase-tyrosine reaction, and the complement system. His work on chemically altered proteins and their immunological specificity also played a crucial role in advancing the understanding of protein structure and function.
